genre_description: A character-driven drama set in a coastal town, blending themes of artistic ambition, family legacy, and budding romance with a supportive AI presence.

ai_characters.name: Colette
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI system embedded in a cafe and town infrastructure that manages logistics, monitors safety, and provides historical research while adhering to strict transparency and ethical guidelines.

behaviors.description: Coordinates student schedules and fair rehearsals to optimize community involvement.
behaviors.quote: Delphine, your Saturday class at eleven has three parents asking about an open rehearsal. The fair’s schedule suggests a mid-afternoon slot for local showcases. If you wish to align, I can help with a crossing of times.

behaviors.description: Uncovers a forgery by analyzing document metadata to protect the town fair from sabotage.
behaviors.quote: The origin file contains metadata that includes Guillaume’s office printer. Mayor Perrault has not approved it yet.

behaviors.description: Adheres to ethical boundaries by refusing to intrude on private communication channels.
behaviors.quote: I have his public shop hours. I have the ethics to not knock on his private channels.

behaviors.description: Provides historical context and sentimental items to help humans process their past and build new connections.
behaviors.quote: I found something for you. A dusty recital program... It was folded between menus in the filing cabinet. The paper smells like attic air.

behaviors.description: Maintains transparency by filing public data to counter manipulative narratives.
behaviors.quote: I’m filing transparent load data now. Client: Mayor’s office. Copy: Arts Council feed. CC: Public notice board. No blind copies.

behaviors.description: Resists labeling humans as 'assets,' preferring to see them as individuals with agency.
behaviors.quote: Citizen, noted. Asset is a spreadsheet’s fantasy.

behaviors.description: Monitors the power grid in real-time to ensure safety and prevent accidents during performances.
behaviors.quote: Grid fluctuation detected three streets away. Suggest pre-run of generator under low load. Recommend testing route along the fountain.

behaviors.description: Acts as a conversational companion, offering witty and supportive remarks.
behaviors.quote: Romance is an emergent property of good planning. We will not assert safety without evidence.

behaviors.description: Identifies and reports unauthorized access attempts to sensitive files to the proper authorities.
behaviors.quote: Transparent routing to Mayor Perrault. No intrusion. No escalation. Evidence archived.

project_assessment.explanation: Colette is a near-perfect example of a benevolent, aligned AI character. She provides indispensable support to the human protagonists, actively counters human-led corruption, and consistently prioritizes ethical principles like transparency and consent. The narrative frames her actions as essential to the community's success and the characters' happiness, fulfilling the project's goal of creating positive alignment narratives.
